mapper.select: select DUES_CLM_YM, DUES_TOTAL_AMT from (select * from PUBLICDUES where FRCS_NO = #{crrFrcsNo} order by DUES_CLM_YM desc) where ROWNUM <= 12
mapper.update: update PUBLICDUES set DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT = #{duesElectricAmt}, DUES_WATER_AMT = #{duesWaterAmt}, DUES_GAS_AMT = #{duesGasAmt}, DUES_MTRT_AMT = #{duesMtrtAmt}, DUES_TOTAL_AMT = (#{duesElectricAmt} + #{duesWaterAmt} + #{duesGasAmt} + #{duesMtrtAmt}) where DUES_CLM_YM = #{duesClmYm} and FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo}
mapper.insert: insert into PUBLICDUES (DUES_CLM_YM, FRCS_NO, DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT, DUES_WATER_AMT, DUES_GAS_AMT, DUES_MTRT_AMT, DUES_PAY_DT, DUES_TOTAL_AMT) values (#{duesClmYm}, #{frcsNo}, #{duesElectricAmt}, #{duesWaterAmt}, #{duesGasAmt}, #{duesMtrtAmt}, sysdate, (#{duesElectricAmt} + #{duesWaterAmt} + #{duesGasAmt} + #{duesMtrtAmt}))
mapper.select: select * from PUBLICDUES where FRCS_NO=#{crrFrcsNo} and DUES_CLM_YM = #{viewDate}
